fields.name: DataSet
fields.description: Has definition for data in this report config.

fields.name: IncludeMonetaryCommitment
fields.description: If true, report includes monetary commitment.

fields.name: TimePeriod
fields.description: Has time period for pulling data for the report.

fields.name: Timeframe
fields.description: The time frame for pulling data for the report. If custom, then a specific time period must be provided.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the report. Usage represents actual usage, forecast represents forecasted data and UsageAndForecast represents both usage and forecasted data. Actual usage and forecasted data can be differentiated based on dates.
